title: Design System Update
content:
Hey team! I've updated our design system with new components and color guidelines. The new design tokens are now available in Figma and I've documented all the changes in our style guide.

Key updates include:
- Updated primary color palette
- New typography scale
- Consistent spacing guidelines
- Improved accessibility standards

Please review and let me know if you have any questions!
author: Sarah Chen
